name: crab & fish
description:
in 2018 i spent a week at the seaside, looking at shells and rockpools and the little creatures that lived there.

it was good, but i missed my partner.

so this is a flatgame about a little hermit crab coming home to their fishfriend, i guess.

arrow keys to move. it's very small & has no goal beyond taking a tiny walk with a tiny crab.

(it's also me trying to learn the very basics of construct2. i really don't know how to make games.)
